name: Conquerors
description:
Prevent the conquest of your planet. Use your enemie's weapons against themselfs.

INGAME CONTROLS

W - move up
A - move left
S - move down
D - move right
W/A/S/D + right mouse button - dodge

Inside an enemy
left mouse button - shoot
right mouse button - leave enemy body/excecute enemy

ESC - back to title screen
